parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: This parameter is used to ensure that the modified resource is consistent with the resource to be modified. You can obtain the parameter value from the responses of [CreateTrigger](~~190054~~), [GetTrigger](~~190056~~), and [UpdateTrigger](~~190055~~) operations.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when the request is initiated on the client. The format of the value is: **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT**.
